jump_scares.spoiler: Beau is attacked by one of the creatures (while we get some warning the attack is quite loud and violent)
Regan knocks over a lamp during a game of monopoly and the ensuing loud noise during a previously quiet scene may be quite startling for some viewers
There is a loud bang on the roof of the house
As Lee listens by a window, a raccoon suddenly screeches and runs past
A raccoon is suddenly attacked by one of the creatures
As Regan is about to descend the stairs, Lee grabs her and pulls her back
Marcus walks past an old man who is watching him in the background
A creature walks past the doorway above the stairs
The creature makes a loud noise
Evelyn puts a bloodied hand on the shower window startling Lee
As Regan goes to pick up the torch, Marcus grabs her wrist
Marcus falls through a metal door and lands in the grain silo
The creature drops down into the grain silo beside Regan
After a period of silence we see the creature outside the car, the creature then breaks through the window with a loud crash
The creature smashes against the police car while Lee is speaking to Officer Ronnie
A creature lands on a car in front of Evelyn and her kids
As Evelyn blindly drives in reverse, a creature climbs out of a smashed tour bus windshield
The creature leaps towards Officer Ronnie and slams into the police car
Evelyn steps on a trip wire which drops a large rope full of glass bottles
Marcus steps on a bear trap alerting the aliens to the family’s location
Emmett grabs Evelyn as she enters the refinery to silence her as an alien crawls down the wall behind her
Reagan is startled by a pack of birds hiding in the train
The body of a dead person falls against Reagan as she releases the first aid box from the train’s restroom
Reagan doesn’t hear the creature board the train after she falls backward
Emmett is startled by something as he attempts to unmoor the boat
An unknown girl startles Emmett
Marcus parts the curtain and discovers Emmett’s wife’s corpse
A creature leaps onto the convertible and rips open the soft top
A creature leaps onto the convertible AGAIN
A creature grabs a man and drags him out from under a garage door
A creature rips off the door
A creature rips the furnace door open as Evelyn tries to close and lock it
There is a sudden growl
The creature growls and comes forward quickly
The cop is impaled from behind
The creature breaks through the window
A sheep carcass comes down from the ceiling
The hanging sheep moves
A sheep hybrid comes out of the darkness
A creature comes into view in the crack
A creature jumps at Friend as he turns around
The creature snarls to stop Gunner
A creature suddenly appears in the view hole
A hand reaches out and grabs Jesse’s walkie talkie which is lying on the ground
A shadow passes by the window
Adam calls out for Paul to stop the car as her sees something in the woods
Something hits the light behind Paul causing it to shatter
Something moves away as Paul shines his torch on some hay bales
A creature passes in front of the police car
A creature moves quickly past the camera
Jim puts his hand on Paul’s shoulder
Something moves quickly across the screen on the camera footage
Something bangs on the outside of the house
The creature knocks over Donny as he runs to the house
A loud bang startles the occupants of the church
Some chairs fall to the floor
The creature grabs Donny
A light falls to the ground and breaks. A few seconds later the creature drops from the ceiling and reveals itself
A creature turns around and lunges at the camera

movies.title: Don’t Be Afraid of the Dark

jump_scares.spoiler: The housekeeper trips on the wire and falls down the stairs
Sally is suddenly picked up by Mr Harris while exploring in some bushes
The fireplace cover falls to the ground
The teddy-bear suddenly moves forward as Sally goes to touch it
There is a high pitched screaming noise when Sally shines the torch in the fireplace
The creatures tip over Sally’s lamp
Sally crawls under the bed sheets, when she reaches the end of the bed a creature jumps up at her. [Video]
A creature comes out from behind the sink in the bathroom and screeches at Sally
There is a sudden noise in the distance
As the group look around the room with a flashlight, there is suddenly a cut to a creepy old man behind some shelves who turns at the camera with a sound cue
Paulina leans in towards the seemingly dead creepy old man, who suddenly grabs her the shoulder
A sudden, very loud noise scares the entire group
Claire approaches Dave in bed before disappearing. When, Dave turns around, she is right in front of his face
While walking backwards, Alan runs into the creepy old man
The soldier touches the seemingly dead man with a knife, and he springs back up
Alan turns around, shining the light on the creepy old man who is standing right in front of him
As Paulina slowly reaches out for her son’s shoulder, he quickly turns around
The son runs at Paulina, briefly going out of frame. When he reappears, his face shifts and he begins attacking Paulina
There is a sudden earthquake
A closet door closes on its own, revealing Claire with a knife behind it
Claire appears on screen and screams as she attacks the camera
A sudden scream is heard in the distance
As Tyler and Paulina walk into the dark corridor, there is a gasping sound right in front of them
The camera’s night vision shows a woman right in front of Tyler and Paulina who looks up at the camera and screams
The water begins to bubble, scaring Paulina
Paulina looks up from the ground and sees her son right in front of her, who then screams
Paulina stands up, and there is a rotting corpse right in front of her face
Paulina looks down from the ceiling with the flashlight and shines it on Pepe
Several compartments suddenly come out of the sphere with a loud mechanical noise
The alien child suddenly spits a strange goo over the group
The child suddenly implodes, splattering black goo all over the room
Kishimoto suddenly tackles the alien from the side
Several compartments once again suddenly come out of Gantz
The presumably dead alien jumps back up behind Kato
The alien loudly implodes
The large statue implodes, sending rocks flying everywhere
The statue suddenly begins to move, attacking Kurono with its swords
As the statue’s reflection slowly becomes visible, it attacks, shattering the glass
The statue suddenly begins to attack at extreme speed
The small grabber jumps up after Lisa asks “is it dead?” and then attacks the group
There is a loud noise as something bangs on the shelter door
A bird flies past while Zoe looks through the periscope
Zoe sees a figure while looking through the periscope
Claire grabs Zoe from behind
There is a loud thump from above
A rock hits the family’s parked car
A hand grabs Julia by her leg
One of Frank’s bodies falls through as door as Kirsty approaches
Kirsty reaches into the box but is suddenly zapped as her hand gets close
Kirsty opens a closet and a Jesus sculpture falls out
A demon appears over Kirsty’s shoulder
Darry is surprised by rats as he looks into the pipe
A hand reaches out of the body bag and grabs Darry around the ankle. [Video]
A crow caws loudly, startling Trish
Darry suddenly appears at the car window. [Video]
A phone rings
There is a gunshot, followed by a second gunshot a few seconds later
The creature drops down onto the windscreen in front of Darry and Trish
The creature jumps down onto a police officer and kills him
The creature comes around a corner while Darry, Trish, and Jezelle are arguing
The creature grabs Jezelle around the head
The creature bursts through the door of the interrogation room
A homeless man pops up against the window
A sound effect plays as Jeremiah becomes agitated when asking Marlene to fetch Brother Swan
As the lights flicker, the Black Skulls suddenly grab Red and Mandy from their beds
Accompanied by a sound effect, Red looks in a bedroom to see a dead couple covered in blood
There is a loud gunshot and the television blows out
As Red tastes the contents of the jar, he violently hallucinates and some unsettling imagery flashes across the screen
A man is thrown backwards through a door, hitting a wall
A sudden sound of a blender coming from the kitchen
A TV suddenly turns on
A shadowy figure suddenly attacks Derek
Madison suddenly gasps as she sees a dead body
A shadowy figure suddenly slams the front door shut as Madison is trying to escape
Maddie suddenly appears at the window
A body with a bloodied face falls from the ceiling
Accompanied by a screech, a mysterious figure can be seen downstairs suddenly running from one side to the other
As Madison turns after putting clothes in the washer, a screaming woman suddenly appears on the other side of the washer door glass
As the prisoner tries to cut her ropes, a trophy/dagger is thrown landing in a wooden post and just missing her face
A shadowy figure suddenly appears
A carriage suddenly moves, accompanied by a sound
Gabriel suddenly jumps down from his hiding place
An escaping woman falls through the attic floor
As Madison shouts and gets angry, the lights in the interrogation room explode
A lot of light bulbs in the police station explode all at once
The hospital security guard’s pacemaker explodes out of his chest

movies.title: Nobody Sleeps in the Woods Tonight

jump_scares.spoiler: A postman gets grabbed by his feet and pulled inside a hole
A fox runs across the screen (accompanied by a loud sound)
Sudden cut to a monster standing above a character (accompanied by a loud sound)
Sudden cut to a rotten body (accompanied by a loud sound)
A severed head gets thrown out of the hole
A boy looks at his friend and sees her gruesomely killed
A priest turns around and sees a monster standing right next to him
Little boys turn their heads and look at their mom (accompanied by a loud sound)
A girl suddenly runs into a window of a police car
A crow cried loudly
Steve is grabbed from above
The door opens and one of the girls is wielding a cleaver
Tracey says “What do you mean, marked?” and there is a quick cut to Pumpkinhead
Ed is suddenly in the kid’s way
A man gets attacked by a crazed animal
The group run over something on the road while driving
Seth goes to touch the road-kill when suddenly it jumps up at him
Something bangs on the door
One of the infected bodies slams against the door
The group rotate to see a cop wielding a gun outside the front door
As Seth pulls the police radio through the window, one of the infected hosts jumps down from the gas station roof. [Video]
The infected hand begins to run at the couple
An infected body jumps on the car while Seth is inside
An infected jumps out from behind one of the gas station stands
A door slams
Accompanied by a sound effect, Hallie sees a shadowy figure moving in the living room
After falling over, Chloe looks up and sees Slender Man towering above her
Accompanied by a sound effect, Wren is startled by Hallie
Wren and Hallie spot Chloe standing by herself with a dazed expression
Accompanied by a sound effect, a woman walks in front of Wren
Slender Man appears in front of Wren
Slender Man appears behind Wren
Chloe suddenly appears in front of her window startling Wren and Hallie
After Tom says “Hey, come here”, Hallie looks back at him and his face takes on a horrible distorted expression and a loud staticky sound effect plays
Hallie is suddenly attacked by Slender Man as she hides behind a tree trunk
Lizzie grabs Hallie’s arm
A tentacle breaks through the window and pulls Wren outside
Hallie looks around and Slender Man appears right in front of her face
Tentacles wrap themselves around Hallie
As Aubrey closes the door a man runs up to it and pounds on the window pane
Aubrey closes her eyes and the screen cuts to black. A second later, the screen suddenly cuts back in to show the creature standing right above her
As Aubrey begins to doze off there is suddenly a loud flash of a woman undressing
The lights go out, and a few seconds later a red light comes on to reveal a creature standing right in front of Aubrey
Louise attempts to bite Evan
A bird flies out of the log
As Jenn looks around the creature places its feet in front of her
The rope tying the hammock to the tree slips off
The creature grabs the raft
The creature pierces through the raft
The creature grabs Jenn through the bottom of the raft and drags her down
Sam jumps on Amelia’s bed
There is a loud thump followed by a scream
Amelia sees the Babadook through the window of Mrs. Roach’s house
The Babadook crawls across the ceiling above Amelia’s bed. [Video]
The Babadook comes down towards Amelia who then wakes up from a nightmare. [Video]
Amelia sees the Babadook through her rear view mirror
There is some loud inaudible talking just before Amelia wakes up
The Babadook stretches out his arms
A hat falls down into the fireplace
Amelia screams loudly at Sam
There is a loud roaring noise as something approaches Amelia
The title card appears abruptly on the screen accompanied by a scream. [Video]
The gas station attendant suddenly appears in front of Holden
Holden removes a painting from the wall to reveal a window with Dana standing behind it
The cellar door opens by itself
Jules is stabbed in the hand while having sex
An agitated Curt suddenly appears beside Marty
Something punches through the cabin wall
A zombie breaks through the window and grabs Marty
A zombie hand comes through the window in Dana’s room
Holden is stabbed in the back by a zombie
Holden is stabbed in the neck while driving
The father zombie bangs his chain down in front of Dana
Dana puts her face up to a window and a werewolf lunges at the glass from the other side. [Video]
Sarah runs into Beth at the hospital
A metal rod smashes through the window during one of Sarah’s dreams. [Video]
A large number of bats fly out in front of the girls
Juno jumps down in front of Sarah
Sarah turns around and Juno is right behind her
A crawler is seen standing behind the group through the night vision camera. [Video]
The girls run into a crawler that screams at them. [Video]
Sarah hallucinates her daughter, however when her head turns she becomes one of the creatures from the cave. [Video]
Holly’s body is dropped in front of Sarah, the creatures then proceed to eat the body
A crawler drops down from the roof in front of Rebecca. [Video]
Beth sticks her hand in the air and calls for Sarah
A baby crawler jumps on Sarah’s back
Sam sees a crawler moving along the cave roof
A crawler grabs Rebecca
Juno spots a crawler while underwater  it growls at Juno
Juno appears in the car beside Sarah. [Video](original ending)
A bloody woman smashes against the car window
A dog runs out of dark hole
A camouflage crawler screams at Sarah
A crawler suddenly apears next the the thermal camera
The camera pans to the left exposing a crawler
Sarah grabs Rios from behind
Dan is attacked by a crawler

A crawler attacks Greg
A crawler attacks Cath
Sarah touches Rios shoulder
A crawler jumps towards Vaines
A crawler jumps out from under the water
A crawler jumps out from under the water a second time
Juno comes into camera view and screams
A hand grabs Juno
Rios gets hit with a shovel
A crawler jumps out of the hole towards the camera
Buzz bumps into a beam in the dark looking for an exit
A hand reached out under the Funhouse bunting and grabs Joey
The Funhouse electricity kicks on causing the animatronic monsters to move and the loud thunder and lightning sound effects to turn on
A skeleton leaps out of the floor and a rope drops around Richie’s neck
Liz falls screaming through a trap door
As Buzz attempts to comfort Amy, the monster-son falls between them and attacks Amy
The father, impaled on the sword grabs Buzz
Amy is started by the monster-son lurking amongst the Funhouse animatronic characters
The monster breaks through a locked door
A piece of equipment falls from the upper mechanical deck
A wooden ladder slam onto the floor in front of Amy
Even with the power cut, The Fat Lady starts moving and cackling and surprises Amy
The sound of steam releasing from a pump startles Liz

In an homage to both John Carpenter’s classic Halloween (1978) and Hitchcock’s Psycho (1960) young Joey sneaks into the bathroom dressed as a maniacal clown, rips back the shower curtain, raises a knife, and surprises his horrified sister
The son of the carny tears his Frankenstein mask off revealing his disfigured face
Joey is startled by a menacing dog
A magician scares the audience when an volunteer from the audience steps into The Impaler and gets a stake hammered into the her heart
A creepy man offers Joey a ride then unexpectedly points a shotgun at him
Brundlefly bursts through the glass window of the hopsital room where Veronica is about to have an abortion
Brundlefly jumps down from the ceiling onto Borans
Something bangs on the outhouse
An old man appears behind Lynn
Bobby bangs against the caravan
Someone runs past the camera while Bobby is searching for his dog
Doug sees the baby through the window and turns to see a mutant walk from behind the building
As Doug is leaving the building he is a confronted by a mutant
One of the mutants jumps through the door
A mutant jumps through the wall
A mutant jumps onto Doug from above

movies.title: The Last Voyage Of The Demeter

jump_scares.spoiler: The quick montage of the various shots of the ship ends with a sudden unrelated shot of Dracula lunging at the camera before the screen cuts to black
Culminating the long suspenseful scene, something suddenly moves inside the pile of dirt, startling Clemens who yelps and jumps back
Olgaren moves the spyglass and sees a closeup of Dracula’s face
Someone grabs Clemens by the shoulder from behind
Dracula moves and jumps at Petrofsky
The hatch of the cargo hold in the foreground of the shot is bumped from below
A flash of lightning reveals Dracula standing behind Larsen
Dracula jumps down at Larsen from the mast above him
A sudden cut from a quiet tense sequence to a closeup of Toby’s fingers opening the door with a loud sound
Olgaren bangs on the door after a drawn out moment of quiet tension
A sudden cut from a quiet tense sequence to a shot with loud voices and frantic movement happening in the foreground
Olgaren snarls and lunges at Clemens
Clemens, Captain Eliot and others see Dracula through the hole in the door
Dracula jumps down and grabs Toby
Abrams is hit in the head from behind
A cut to a closeup of Dracula’s snarling face
Toby’s eyes open, revealing milky white color
After several seconds of suspense, Dracula suddenly flies directly at the camera out of the mist
Captain Eliot turns around to see snarling Dracula right behind him
The Fouke Monster unexpectedly opens a window and reaches its hand inside at the family
The Fouke Monster hits the bathroom window
As Bobby walks back towards the house, he suddenly runs into the Fouke Monster
An explosion in the sand scares rick
As Evy is searching where a sound comes from a skeleton pops up with a very loud sound effect (but it turns out to be a joke from Jonathan)
Rick throws a bag on the table scaring Evy
When Evy comes up from picking her brush, Hook from the Medjai is suddenly behind her
When Rick and the group turns around the group of Americans are pointing guns at them
A mild jump scare when Jonathan suddenly takes his hand out of his bag
When Rick and Jonathan first open Imhotep’s sarcophagus, his wet corpse pops out
When Evy reads from the book of the dead Imhotep´s corpse suddenly wakes up and lets out a roar
A shadow suddenly passes by
The ground suddenly shakes
A hand pops out of the ground
Mr. Daniels checks the window and suddenly a sandstorm blows towards him
When Rick decapitates a mummy, the mummy holds his head and Rick then slams the sword to the head causing the mummy´s head to fly towards the screen
Anck Su Namun pops up behind Rick and Evy
Evy runs into Anck Su Namuns
A creature lands on the window
There is a loud clanking noise
One of the group is grabbed from behind by a man trapped in a spider web
The returning group bang on the door of the supermarket
The soldier outside the supermarket is taken away suddenly by a creature
John turns around and Louisa is no longer in bed. There is a flash of lightning and suddenly Louisa is standing right beside him
John opens a ball and a spider crawls out
There is a loud thunderclap
Something moves across the road in front of John’s car
A stone hits the car window, startling John
A shadow moves past Sam in the attic and he falls of the ladder
John shines the torch around the room and is surprised by a man watching him
The officer slams the breaks on suddenly as something appears in front of the car
The officer is attacked after he puts his head out the window
A creature breaks through the window
John shoots a creature as it comes through a doorway
Accompanied by a sound effect, the group see a mangled animal corpse in the trees
Luke stands outside the cabin for a few seconds after he hears noises from the woods. Hutch then appears behind him and calls out “Luke” which may startle some viewers
Phil approaches the upstairs door but before he can enter Dom makes a loud noise by breaking a chair
During Luke’s dream there is a sharp high pitched noise
The liquor shelf suddenly falls away and Luke wakes up
Luke sees some slight movement behind the trees and a sound effect plays (although nothing particularly scary occurs on screen)
Accompanied by a sound effect, Luke sees some fluorescent lights flicker
Luke sees the neighboring tent flung into the air
Luke calls out to Phil and immediately after Phil is taken by the beast
Accompanied by a sound effect, Luke sees Dom hiding behind a tree trunk
The beast breaks through the trees in front of Luke and Dom
A door loudly bursts open
Dom looks back at his wife who has now transformed into the beast
One of the corpses suddenly moves slightly (this is accompanied by a sharp sound effect)
Luke gets to his feet and attempts to hobble away but the beast jumps down beside him
A man breaks through a door
Accompanied by a sound effect, a masked figure appears on the previously black screen
Accompanied by a sound effect, Allison ducks down to reveal Dr. Powell watching her from the doorway
A man is shown with his neck suddenly cut open
The lights cut out suddenly
Maggie has a sudden vision of a grotesque creature which causes her to fall backwards in fear
The creature’s foot stamps on the ground
Simon opens a door and Kim rushes out
A girl narrates about her respect for her policeman father, who is looking at the camera and smiling. Suddenly, his head explodes
The mutant jumps out from behind some cops
The man in the black coat walks past in the background accompanied by a string sound effect
As Norah points her flashlight in front of her, the camera scrolls to reveal a dead body right in her face
While Smith and Paul investigate the back of a dead body, something suddenly jumps out from inside the body right at the camera
Emily pokes the creature, which causes it to suddenly get up and shriek
During a quiet scene, something hits the outside of the building, making a loud noise
Paul puts his ear on a wall, followed by a loud noise that startles him
There is another banging sound that startles the crew
Something hits the outside of the building again
As the crew point a flashlight to a window in the ceiling, a bunch of tentacles suddenly smash against it

One of the creatures swims right in front of Norah

As the captain looks in front of him, one of the creatures swims towards the camera
Norah shines the light on a creature that suddenly attempts to grab her

An eye appears in the man’s belongings

Banging from the coffin knocks things over

One of the soldiers reaches out for the woman who quickly grabs him on the arm
